blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: What‚Äôs Your Emotional Intelligence Superpower?

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
Whether you're navigating stress, leading others, or building deeper 
connections, Emotional Intelligence (EI) is a game-changer. 

This quiz reveals your dominant EI strength and gives you insight into how 
you can develop your full emotional potential. Tap into what truly makes
 you powerful ‚Äî from empathy to self-awareness.

Let‚Äôs find out what your superpower is.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When faced with a tense situation, what‚Äôs your first reaction?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Think about how to bring everyone back together.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Look for the lesson or silver lining.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Take a moment to notice how it affects me.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Tune into how others are feeling.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Someone you care about is upset ‚Äîwhat do you do?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Find ways to motivate or cheer them up.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Reassure them that things will improve.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Reflect on your own reactions and avoid adding tension.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Listen and feel what they feel.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You‚Äôre under pressure. How do you handle it?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Rally your circle for support and progress.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Keep a positive mindset and keep moving.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Get clear about your own emotional triggers.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Stay calm for others‚Äô sake.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: In a group project, what role do you naturally fall into?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. The one who unites the vision and people.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. The one who keeps morale high.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. The one who reflects on how things are flowing.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. The one who keeps harmony.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You‚Äôve made a mistake ‚Äî what‚Äôs your approach?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Reframe it as part of the bigger mission.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Laugh, learn, and get better.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Own up and learn about yourself through it.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Acknowledge how others may feel about it.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your inner voice sounds like‚Ä¶

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. ‚ÄúHow are they feeling?‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. ‚ÄúWhy did this affect me this way?‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs okay, everything‚Äôs a lesson.‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got this ‚Äî keep going!‚Äù

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When you get feedback, you...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Sense the emotions behind the words.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Examine your internal response first.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Take it in stride and use it as fuel.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. See it as guidance for the team or future path.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your friends would describe you as...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Deeply compassionate.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Mindful and grounded.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Uplifting and positive.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. Inspiring and unifying.

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
Well done ‚Äîyou didn‚Äôt just take a quiz... you took a moment to understand you.

What you've just done shows courage, curiosity, and a deeper kind of intelligence that most overlook.

üîé Press the button below and step into the mirror ‚Äîwhere you‚Äôll meet the version of you that‚Äôs been waiting to be seen.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üíé Result A: The Grounded Heart

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôre the emotional anchor in the room. Calm under pressure, deeply 
empathetic, and quietly powerful ‚Äî you‚Äôre someone others instinctively 
turn to when the world gets messy. You don‚Äôt just feel ‚Äî you understand.
 Your presence says, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got this,‚Äù and your grounded energy inspires
 trust wherever you go.
üåü Your Superpower: Emotional stability that soothes storms.
üí° Your Growth Edge: Speak your truth boldly ‚Äî your voice matters more than you think.
üß† Next Level: Your kind of leadership is rare. Double down by setting boundaries with clarity and care ‚Äî your inner peace is

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üî• Result B: The Expressive Flame

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôre emotionally alive, intuitive, and fiercely expressive. You don‚Äôt 
bottle things up ‚Äîyou share from the heart and connect deeply because of
 it. You make the invisible visible. Your emotions are your radar and 
your storytelling is your strength.
üåü Your Superpower: Authentic connection through raw honesty.
üí° Your Growth Edge: Pause before reacting ‚Äî your depth deserves direction.
üß†
 Next Level: Channel your intensity into passion projects or people who 
match your fire. You‚Äôre here to shake things up, not tone it down.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üß† Result C: The Thoughtful Observer

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôve got range ‚Äîyou think before you feel, and when you do feel, it‚Äôs 
insightful and wise. You‚Äôre a thinker with heart, observing everything 
from the shadows and making powerful inner decisions. You‚Äôre not cold 
‚Äîyou‚Äôre strategic, and that makes your empathy intentional, not 
reactive.
üåü Your Superpower: Pattern recognition with emotional depth.
üí° Your Growth Edge: Let your guard down more often ‚Äîyour truth doesn‚Äôt need to be perfect to be powerful.
üß† Next Level: Build trust by expressing more of what you feel in the moment ‚Äîpeople are ready for the full you.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: ‚ö° Result D: The Adaptive Mirror

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You feel others so well, it‚Äôs almost second nature. You can walk into a 
room and know exactly what‚Äôs going on emotionally. You shift, adapt, and
 move fluidly ‚Äînot out of fear, but because you get it. This makes you 
magnetic, relatable, and deeply influential.
üåü Your Superpower: Emotional mirroring ‚Äîpeople feel safe around you.
üí° Your Growth Edge: Don‚Äôt lose yourself in everyone else‚Äôs story.
üß† Next Level: Anchor your identity in values, not vibes ‚Äîwhen you do, your impact goes from flexible to unstoppable.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt need permission to rise ‚Äîyou only need awareness of your own power.‚Äù
